news.title: stable-pretraining
news.description: We're excited to announce the release of stable-pretraining v0.1.0, the first major milestone of our open-source framework for self-supervised pretraining. Built on top of PyTorch Lightning, stable-pretraining focuses on providing real-time visibility into training qualityâ€”offering detailed logging, monitoring, and a rich callback ecosystem (including OnlineProbe, OnlineKNN, RankMe, and more). The framework makes it easy to inspect representation collapse, training dynamics, and downstream performance, allowing researchers and practitioners to iterate faster and debug more effectively.
news.summary: We're excited to announce the release of stable-pretraining v0.1.0, our open-source framework for self-supervised pretraining. Try it!
